text: I love my life because it gave me you. I love you because you are my life.
You're my only choice because no one else makes me happy like you.
You're special to me in every way. Thank you for being who you are.
I like the way you make me feel even when you're nowhere near.
You wanna know who I'm in love with? Read the first word again. :)
My favourite place in the world is next to you.
Together forever. Never be apart. Maybe in distance. But never in heart.
If I were blind, within my heart I could still see the beauty that is you.
Have I mention today how lucky I am to be in love with you?
